info.name: Wishlist
info.description:
The goal of this project is to provide a shopping and/or wishlist list to nextcloud.
Other that using notes, tasks or other existing next cloud projects for this purpose the features should include:
* sharing/ publishing lists for non registered users * a "pick as gift" function for non registered users. To temporary hide wishlist items to avoid duplicate gifts. * a simple method to add list items by webshop links with: ** automatic detection of product details like price, image, description, availability, ... ** periodic check of reachability/ availability of list items ** integration of well known shops like Amazon, Etsy, ... * a dedicated Android app to be able to add list items by sharing links from a browser
info.author: Johannes Szeibert
